quote: A complete atheist stands on the next-to-last upper step to the most complete faith (he may or may not take that step), while the indifferent one has no faith, apart from a bad fear.
quote_letters: A COMPLETE ATHEIST STANDS ON THE NEXT-TO-LAST UPPER STEP TO THE MOST COMPLETE FAITH HE MAY OR MAY NOT TAKE THAT STEP WHILE THE INDIFFERENT ONE HAS NO FAITH APART FROM A BAD FEAR
